From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

About my latest scenario, # 150.

Hehehehehehe to any who play it with a 1 member team especially if 
that team is composed of either a mage or archmage.  It is very 
tricky to beat that scenario with a mage or achmage, even if either 
character has experience level above 100.  In fact, one of the ironies 
of this scenario is it harder because the elves can't get directly to 
you, but it does show the stupidity of the elves.  Instead of 
launching their most powerfull attacks, they constistently stick with 
their basic attack most of the time, even at point blank range against 
you.  I have been playing against it for a while, and I still have 
trouble beating it with either my mega mage or mega archmage.

Anyway I do not expect replies to this message.
